Name: Mobile Framework for Healthcare Adoption of Short-Message Technologies (mFHAST)
Aliases: Short Message Technologies: This workgroup will be using the term Short-Message Technologies (SMTs) to refer to the domain of technologies that utilize short-message mediums, commonly known as text messaging applications.
